description.ko: 바다의 무중력 품 안에서 펼쳐지는 생명체의 평화롭고 투명한 춤사위입니다.
description.en: The peaceful, translucent dance of life within the weightless embrace of the ocean.

prompt: Microscopic view of translucent jellyfish-like lifeforms suspended in a chaotic swirl of oxygen bubbles and caustic light patterns. Fluid simulation showing the intricate turbulence of the deep sea. Deep blue and turquoise tones #006994 and #48D1CC. Unreal Engine 5, Octane Render, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics, 8k, raytraced caustics, volumetric underwater lighting, and subsurface scattering on the membranes.
